title: eraDu ondAgadu
sahitya:
eraDu ondAgadu ranga


anupallavi

  eraDu ondAgadu endendigu ranga


caraNam 1    ondu vrSadalli eraDu pakSigaLu onde gUDinalli irutihavu 
ondu pakSi palagaLanumbudu mattondu balangaLanuNNadu ranga
    caraNam 2    halavu kombege ondu hAritu  ondu halavu kombege hAralaiyadu 
halavanella ondu balludu ondu halavanella ariyadu ranga
    caraNam 3    nAreNDu kombege hAritu adu hAri mElakkEri mIritu 
mIri purandara viTTala nimmanu sEri sukhiyAgi nintidu ranga
